There is a political favor to be returned yet, said Roger Kay , president of Endpoint Technologies. One of the issues that precipitated this change[ of the CEO] was what happened in China. But China is not the cause-it's symptomatic of the broader disconnect between the way that Eric Schmidt wanted to run Google and the way the founders wanted to run the company, says David Wolf, chief executive of Wolf Group Asia, a Beijing-based marketing-strategy firm. American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like, "What just happened?'? " James May think every little bit helps your confidence," Chris Webber said. One day you're averaging a number that many people don't do in three categories and the next day you're worthless. And that's from myself, James May don't even care what everyone else is saying. Allen Iverson , who had nine assists, knew Chris Webber was trying too hard to meet monstrous expectations.
